scripts.build: npm run build:auth && npm run build:api && npm run build:worker
scripts.build:auth: cd auth-service && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:api: cd api-gateway && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:worker: cd worker-service && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:worker"
